Package com.intellij.vcs.log

Interface VcsLogDiffHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GitLogDiffHandler

    public interface VcsLogDiffHandler
    Enables showing diff between revisions and comparing file or directory state between a revision and a local version in log-based file history. Methods of this class could be called from EDT, so it should deal with it appropriately by starting a background task for long operations, eg for loading revisions content.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Create a ContentRevision for specified path and commit.

      Show diff between (the after-state of) specified revision and local version for the specified file or directory.

    • Method Detail

      • showDiff

        void showDiff(VirtualFile root,
              FilePath leftPath,
              Hash leftHash,
              FilePath rightPath,
              Hash rightHash)
        Show diff between (the after-state of) two revisions in the specified files or directories.
        Parameters:
        root - repository root.
        leftPath - path to the file on the left, null means file is missing in this revision.
        leftHash - hash of the revision on the left.
        rightPath - path to the file on the right, null means file is missing in this revision.
        rightHash - hash of the revision on the right.

      • showDiffWithLocal

        void showDiffWithLocal(VirtualFile root,
                       FilePath revisionPath,
                       Hash hash,
                       FilePath localPath)
        Show diff between (the after-state of) specified revision and local version for the specified file or directory.
        Parameters:
        root - repository root.
        revisionPath - path to the file in the specified revision, null means file is not present in the revision.
        hash - hash of the revision.
        localPath - local path to the file.

      • showDiffForPaths

        void showDiffForPaths(VirtualFile root,
                      java.util.Collection<FilePath> affectedPaths,
                      Hash leftRevision,
                      Hash rightRevision)
        Show diff between two revisions or between a revision and a local version for the specified set of paths.
        Parameters:
        root - repository root.
        affectedPaths - paths for which to show diff, null means to show all changes between revisions.
        leftRevision - hash of the revision on the left.
        rightRevision - hash of the revision on the right or null if local revision is required.

      • createContentRevision

        ContentRevision createContentRevision(FilePath filePath,
                                      Hash hash)
        Create a ContentRevision for specified path and commit.
        Parameters:
        filePath - file path to create content revision for.
        hash - hash of the revision.
        Returns:
        content revision.
